# ZERO TOLERANCE RULES -
02. Absolutely no out-of-character violent speech, slurs, bigotry, racism, specism (demeaning other characters in-game due to their in-game race), sexism, disability-related or anything even remotely similar. (YOU WILL GET PERMABANNED)
03. No explicit Erotic Roleplay (ERP) or sexual content is allowed, meaning direct mentions or explicit sexual behavior / actions. (YOU WILL GET PERMABANNED) This does not apply to insults, ex: 'You are a Pussy' or 'Eat shit, dickhead'.
